Posts.Content: southrnldy wrote: I hope someone can give me some insight as to what I am experiencing. The top of my breast feels like a hard mass or knot about the size of a half dollar coin and on the side of it (under my arm) if I press down it hurts real bad. Then towards my back under my arm pit about 2 inches from the first spot is another place that if I press down it also hurts real bad. This pain is now running up my shoulder blade and my neck. I just started noticing it a few weeks ago and the pain seems to be getting worse. Have any of you ever had any of these symptoms? What do you think? Thank you very much!!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I'm just not sure, what do you think? southrnldy kellybx3
